title: Ranked Placements Awesome
body: Bronze 2 pre-season. Go 9/1 in placements and get placed Bronze 3..nice.

replies.body: i had a silver friend go 7-3 and get gold 3 lmao
One of my mates was S5, also went 9/1 in placements and got B2

wow .. thats exactly same as what happened to me ... i was actaully looking for the way to send the msg to RIot . i was on silver 5 and all of sudden  they had long patch for session 7  and eveything was reseted to brand new placement.  i won 8 matches out of 10 placements , however, i have placed on bronze 2. i have no idea , actaully how does this process works .. now, basically, i have to struggle myself again at hell to get myself out .

Bronze 3 0 lp last season. 
Climbing during pre-season does help, although usually (from what I have seen) you have to climb** _significantly_** for it to have an impact on your starting place. If you got to B1 before, I believe you can get there again :)
Just be thankful you didn't have to start in B5 like the majority of B3 players.
